footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Kuki Shinobu | Update Date: 01/22/2023 | Editor: Sew#2409

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Freedom Sworn__ The EM substat provides extra damage for her reactions. The passive helps boost her teams total damage.

__Key of Khaj-Nsut__ HP% Passive increases Kuki’s healing. 3 stacks are easily obtained at C4 due to it granting her an extra Skill proc. It is not recommended to prolong rotations to gain extra stacks at lower Constellations.

__Xiphos' Moonlight__ EM substat which strengthens her Hyperbloom damage along with ER share to the whole team.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Iron sting__ Easily obtained craftable weposn with EM substat but relatively useless passive. Refinements are not recommended due to the reason stated above.

 __Toukabou Shigure__ Works fundamentally the same as Iron Sting because they both have the same EM substat.

__Dark Iron Sword__ Should only be use if the other options are not available. Gives lower EM than other weapons.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery |<goblet>  Elemental Mastery |<circlet>  Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Sanctifying Ring
**2)** Elemental Burst: Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Despite the majority of Kuki's Electro application coming from her Skill it is still important to cast her Burst on cooldown to have more Electro application and extend rotations when  necessary.

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Kuki Shinobu | Update Date: 09/26/2022 | Editor: Sew#2409

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: __Key of Khaj-Nisut__ The HP% substat and passive in addition to the Elemental Mastery scaling nature of the weapon make it the best weapon for a healer Kuki.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Freedom Sworn, Iron Sting, Favonius Sword

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> HP% or Elemental Master |<goblet>  HP% or Elemental Mastery |<circlet>  Healing Bonus or HP% or Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Kuki's Burst is not a priority for a healing build as it does not provide any utility unless she has a 4 piece Noblesse Oblige.

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Kuki Shinobu | Update Date: 02/28/2023 | Editor: Sew#2409

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Primordial Jade Cutter__ The high Crit Rate substat and HP% passive makes it the best choice for Kuki's personal damage.

__Favonius Sword__ Favonius' high ER negates the need to build any ER on Kuki and allows her to focus on more offensive stats while also helping the rest of the team with its clear particles.

__Key of Khaj-Nisut__ HP% substat boosts Kuki's healing. The passive can not be activated on the first rotation but it's long duration means it can be procced in subsequent ones which would boost the teams EM greatly. Much more reliable with C4

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Lion's Roar__ The ATK% isn't very useful for Kuki. However, the DMG% bonus is very valuable in teams that can have high uptime on it. The passive is not reliable with teams that have Nahida in them because of her high Dendro Application.

__ Festering Desire__ ER substat helps alleviate ER reqs and also boosts Skill DMG% with its passive.

__ Iron Sting__ Craftable sword with EM substat and DMG% passive make it a good option for Kuki.

Other Weapons: Mistsplitter Reforged, Light of Foliar Incision, Haran Geppaku Futsu, Freedom Sworn, Toukabou Shigure, Dark Iron Sword
